mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, btitle, bcontent, id, regdate, breadcnt, bdel, bfilename, bselect) values(#{bno},#{btitle},#{bcontent},#{id},curdate(),0,0,0,#{bselect})
mapper.update: update board set btitle = #{btitle} , bcontent=#{bcontent}, bfilename=#{bfilename} ,regdate = curdate() where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: update board set bdel = 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board set breadcnt = breadcnt + 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into boardfile(bfselect, bfilefrom, bfilerealpath, bfileviewpath) values(#{bfselect}, #{bfilefrom}, #{bfilerealpath}, #{bfileviewpath})
mapper.select: select * from board_reply where bno= #{bno} order by reno desc
